Headline: Orange Line Delays, Limited Service/Shuttles Between Kedzie and 35th Archer
ShortDescription: Orange Line svc. exp. delays due to a animal on the tracks near Western; ltd svc via shuttle avail. Kedzie - 35th/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service. exp delays due to a animal on the tracks near Western; ltd svc via shuttle avail. Kedzie - 35th/Archer.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Midway and Kedzie
  • between 35th Archer and the Loop, with limited service

Bus shuttles are also available through the affected area to help make connections.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
